## Page 27: Distinguishing Between a Theoretical and Conceptual Framework in a Dis – DissertationPrep
URL: https://dissertationprep.com/blogs/blog/distinguishing-between-a-theoretical-and-conceptual-framework-in-a-dissertation
Date: 2023-04-18
Description: This article explains the difference between theoretical and conceptual frameworks for students and mentors in the research process. A theoretical framework provides a broad set of principles, concepts, and assumptions that guide data collection, analysis, and interpretation. A conceptual framework is more specific.
